actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, in order to treat vocational school attendance certification requirements on the same basis as college attendance certification requirements.

summary.text: Requires vocational school attendance certification requirements to be treated on the same basis as college attendance certification requirements for purposes of veterans' education benefits. (Amends 38 U.S.C. 1780(a))

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, in order to treat vocational school attendance certification requirements on the same basis as college attendance certification requirements.
